actionCalls.name: Notify_For_Feasibility_Status_Other_Than_New
actionCalls.label: Notify For Feasibility Status Other Than New

assignments.name: Assign_In_Review_Approved_Not_Approved_Email_List
assignments.label: Assign In Review/Approved/Not Approved Email List

rules.name: For_In_Progress_Ready_for_Review_Revision_Ready_for_Review
rules.label: For In Progress/Ready for Review/Revision Ready for Review

formulas.name: FormulaforRFPstatuschange
formulas.expression: CASE({!$Record.Status}, "Proposal Requested", {!EmailforAM}, "Revision requested", {!EmailforAM}, "In Progress",{!SalesdevEmaillist}, "Ready for Review", {!SalesdevEmaillist}, "Revision Ready for Review",{!SalesdevEmaillist} , "Closed",{!SalesdevEmaillist}, "" )

formulas.name: IsUSTimeZone
formulas.expression: IF( VALUE(LEFT(TEXT({!$Record.CreatedDate}), 2)) > 12, TRUE, /* US Time Zone */ FALSE /* Indian Time Zone */ )

recordUpdates.name: OwnerId_is_being_updated_from_AM_Id
recordUpdates.label: OwnerId is being updated from AM Id.

recordUpdates.name: Update_Oppty_to_Sync_Fields_on_Create
recordUpdates.label: Update Oppty to Sync Fields on Create

textTemplates.name: EmailBodyforcaseclosure
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.SuppliedName}


The below case is closed


Case Number: {!$Record.CaseNumber}

Case Type: {!$Record.RecordType.Name} | {!$Record.Subject__c}

Priority: {!$Record.Priority}

Opportunity : {!$Record.Opportunity__r.Name}

Created Date:{!$Record.CreatedDate}


Thanks

Best regards,

textTemplates.name: Emailbodyforcasecreation
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.SuppliedName}


A new case has been created.


Case Number: {!$Record.CaseNumber}

Case Type: {!$Record.RecordType.Name}

Priority: {!$Record.Priority}

Opportunity : {!$Record.Opportunity__r.Name}

Created Date:{!$Record.CreatedDate}


Thanks

Best regards,

textTemplates.name: EmailBodyforcasePriority
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!$Record.SuppliedName}


The Case Priority has been Updated to Critical.


Case Number: {!$Record.CaseNumber}

Case Type: {!$Record.RecordType.Name}

Priority: {!$Record.Priority}

Opportunity : {!$Record.Opportunity__r.Name}

Created Date:{!$Record.CreatedDate}

Subject : {!$Record.Subject__c}


Thanks

Best regards,

textTemplates.name: EmailBodyforCaseStatusChange
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.SuppliedName}


The Case Status has been Updated to {!$Record.Status}.


Case Number: {!$Record.CaseNumber}

Case Type: {!$Record.RecordType.Name}

Priority: {!$Record.Priority}

Opportunity : {!$Record.Opportunity__r.Name}

Created Date:{!$Record.CreatedDate}


Thanks

Best regards,

textTemplates.name: EmailbodyforReview
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.SuppliedName}


The below case is changed to Ready for Review.


Case Number: {!$Record.CaseNumber}

Case Type: {!$Record.RecordType.Name}

Priority: {!$Record.Priority}

Opportunity : {!$Record.Opportunity__r.Name}

Created Date:{!$Record.CreatedDate}


Thanks

Best regards,

textTemplates.name: ExposureLogsBody
textTemplates.text:
The "Exposure Log" Request/Issue Type has been submitted. Please find the details of the case below:


Case Number: {!$Record.CaseNumber}

Case Type: {!$Record.RecordType.Name}

Priority: {!$Record.Priority}

Opportunity : {!$Record.Opportunity__r.Name}

Created Date:{!$Record.CreatedDate}


Thanks

Best regards,

textTemplates.name: ExposureLogssubject
textTemplates.text: The "Exposure Logs" were submitted for the Request/Issue Type.

textTemplates.name: NotificationBody
textTemplates.text: You have been assigned a new case CaseNumber: {!$Record.CaseNumber}

textTemplates.name: OwnerChangeEmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Dear {!$Record.SuppliedName}

I hope this email finds you well.

A new case has been assigned to you .


Below are the details:

Case Number: {!$Record.CaseNumber}

Case Type: {!$Record.RecordType.Name} | {!$Record.Subject__c}

Case Status: {!$Record.Status}

Due Date: {!$Record.Due_Date__c}

Priority: {!$Record.Priority}

Opportunity : {!$Record.Opportunity__r.Name}

Created Date:{!$Record.CreatedDate}


Please review the case details and take appropriate action within your assigned timeframe.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Best regards,
